mapper.sql: ID, prov_name, city_name, area_name, prov_code, city_code, area_code, alia_name
mapper.select:
select
from t_dict_region tdr WHERE (tdr.prov_name LIKE #{provName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or #{provName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ='all') AND (tdr.city_name LIKE #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ='all') AND (tdr.area_name LIKE #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ='all')
mapper.insert: insert into t_dict_region (ID, prov_name, city_name, area_name, prov_code, city_code, area_code, alia_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
